Does anyone know if the issue with QWidget controls was resolved?

I had a look at VLC, which is Qt based -- as far as I can tell, they're not exposing anything to automation :-/

Some guys over at AutoIT have had success using RanorexSpy ... but although Ranorex seems to see the controls on the window, it's not exposing them to UIAutomation as far as I can tell.
